specifications.Finish: Chemical > Enzyme Enzymes treatment offers a remarkably soft hand-feel by gently breaking down the fibers’ surface, resulting in a smoother and cleaner texture. This treatment also reduces pilling and fuzz, enhancing the fabric’s durability and maintaining a clean appearance
specifications.Care Advice: Woven > Twill Weave > Denim Denim is designed to fade when washed, so be careful. Separate washing is recommended. Chemical > Enzyme Piece printing on enzyme/bio-washed fabric can cause staining. Therefore, please refrain from piece printing on this fabric.
specifications.Care Instructions: Machine wash cold / Gentle Wash separately Turn inside out before washing Do not bleach Tumble dry normal low heat Do not iron Recommended Use Jeans
